definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian hoopoe (Upupa epops)
to put on or wear (glasses, hat, gloves etc)/to respect/to bear/to support

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: The video is about the life histories of Hoopoe in Kinmen.
sentences.chinese: 這部片就是敘述戴勝在金門的生活史。

sentences.english: the stork, any kind of heron, the hoopoe and the bat.
sentences.chinese: 鸛，鷺鷥與其類，戴勝與蝙蝠。

sentences.english: This paper presents the chromosome complement of the Hoopoe .
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了戴勝的染色體組型研究結果。
